item.title: Neille Caroline
item.description:
Neille Caroline

Neille Caroline is a Scotch Connoisseur who is responsible for creating the look and feel of Scotch Culture synonymous with leisurely, timeless elegance.Scotch Culture is comprised of whisky, fashion, interior design/decor, and jet set experiences. Her audience ranges from established millennials to affluent retirees, ages 27-55. With 8500 instagram followers, her influence has a reach of over 500k scotch/whisky and cigar connoisseurs, fashionistas, and trendsetters across all social media, as well as partnerships and affiliations. Social media: Instagram, Facebook fan page, Twitter, Tumblr, and Pinterest @neillecaroline
